success.reason: The assistant located the order placed on 2025-10-26 and successfully executed a cancel_order action on it, confirming full cancellation and refund details to the user.

role_confusion.reason: The user only requested help canceling an order and provided requested details (email, card last 4 digits, zip). They did not ask questions on behalf of the assistant, offer to help the assistant, confirm details for the assistant, or provide recommendations to the assistant.
